argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpinvval.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | grpinvval.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpinvval.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | grpinvval.n | |- N = ( invg ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( x = X -> ( y .+ x ) = ( y .+ X ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( x = X -> ( ( y .+ x ) = .0. <-> ( y .+ X ) = .0. ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_riotabidv | |- ( x = X -> ( iota_ y e. B ( y .+ x ) = .0. ) = ( iota_ y e. B ( y .+ X ) = .0. ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_grpinvfval | |- N = ( x e. B |-> ( iota_ y e. B ( y .+ x ) = .0. ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_riotaex | |- ( iota_ y e. B ( y .+ X ) = .0. ) e. _V |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( X e. B -> ( N ` X ) = ( iota_ y e. B ( y .+ X ) = .0. ) ) |
